GSD.description:
NFSD: Protect against send buffer overflow in NFSv3 READ

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 75d9de25a6f833dd0701ca546ac926cabff2b5af. For more details please see the references link.
